title: ‘We Made Our Maximum Proposal’: Demi Vollering Poised to Leave SD Worx-Protime as Contract Talks Enter Black Hole
content:
Team CEO Erwin Janssen insists he hoped to keep team toppers Kopecky and Vollering together in 2025: 'It hurts a lot'.

Read the full article at ‘We Made Our Maximum Proposal’: Demi Vollering Poised to Leave SD Worx-Protime as Contract Talks Enter Black Hole on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
